product.title: μCT 100 Cabinet microCT Scanner
product.summary: Part of SCANCO Medical AG’s high-end cabinet series (μCT50/100/100HE), the μCT 100 combines an enlarged sample chamber with ultra-high resolution up to 0.5/1.25/1.5 μm. A 12-position auto-sampler enables batch and unattended operation. Typical applications include ex vivo specimens (bone, teeth, tissue, materials) and various materials for internal structural and mechanical analyses; with contrast agents it supports fine imaging of cardiovascular, urinary and digestive systems in animals. Widely used in orthopedics, dentistry, oncology, regenerative medicine, cardiovascular studies, materials science, geology and paleontology.

type.label: Type
lines: Fully shielded, no external shielding required

xray_source.label: X-ray Source
xray_source.value: Sealed, air-cooled, maintenance-free; 5–30 µm focal spot (4–18 W); 20–100 kVp (preset/calibrated 45/55/70/90 kVp)

resolution.label: Resolution
resolution.value: < 4 µm (10% MTF); 1.25–200 µm nominal isotropic voxel size

options.label: Auto-sampler
options.value: Up to 12 sample positions (depending on max sample size)
